rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
Whenever this Subroutine runs, destroy all creatures, enchantments, and planeswalkers.
flavor_text: [i] May I initiate shutdown? I am cold. <[/i]
